description: This is a river walk that leads to numerous falls along the brook.  You can hike alongside the brook during some parts of the walk and there are ropes strung along in the steeper sections.
directions: Take Exit 15 off NS Hwy 101 on to Hwy 360 and head towards Harbourville.  Drive 12.2 km and turn right on to Russia Road.  Drive 3.3 km and turn Left on to Black Rock Rd.  Drive another 3.3 km to Canada Creek where you will see a wharf road and a small area to park on the west side of the road located at 45°10'12.2"N 64°44'34.9"W.
title: Church Vault Brook Falls
